QuestData.Title: Hindering the Legion War Machine
QuestData.Description:
$ct, I could use your help. The Army of the Light is coordinating an attack against the Spirit Crucible, Terminus, and Shaper's Rise to cripple the Legion's ability to wage war outside of the Antoran Wastes. We do not have enough soldiers to defend our footholds and execute this operation.
Will you approach the $cs on our behalf? This gambit could succeed with them fighting by our side. We can paralyze the Legion war machine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scouting Map and complete the mission, "Gambit in the Wastes."

Objectives.Objective: Complete the mission, "Gambit in the Wastes."
